problem.markdown: >>On level ground from a distance of 200 feet, the angle of elevation to the top of a building is 21°, as shown in the figure above. What is the height h of the building, to the nearest foot? << = 77
problem.script: def hintfn1(answer_ids, student_answers, new_cmap, old_cmap): global expect aid = answer_ids[0] ans = student_answers[aid] if new_cmap.is_correct(aid): hint='Your answer has been submitted' new_cmap.set_hint_and_mode(aid,hint,'always') new_cmap.set_property(aid,'npoints',1) new_cmap.set_property(aid,'correctness','corrrectnr') else: hint='Your answer has been submitted' new_cmap.set_hint_and_mode(aid,hint,'always') new_cmap.set_property(aid,'npoints',1) new_cmap.set_property(aid,'correctness','incorrectnr') old_cmap=new_cmap
problem.p: On level ground from a distance of 200 feet, the angle of elevation to the top of a building is 21°, as shown in the figure above. What is the height h of the building, to the nearest foot?

formulaequationinput.label: On level ground from a distance of 200 feet, the angle of elevation to the top of a building is 21°, as shown in the figure above. What is the height h of the building, to the nearest foot?
